text: (ataṟku napiyē!) Kūṟuvīrāka: ‘‘Allāh nāṭiyatait tavira oru naṉmaiyō tīmaiyō nāṉ eṉakkē tēṭikkoḷḷa caktiyaṟṟavaṉ. Ovvoru vakuppārukkum oru kuṟippiṭṭa tavaṇaiyuṇṭu. Avarkaḷuṭaiya tavaṇai varum camayattil oru nāḻikai kūṭa pinta māṭṭārkaḷ; muntakkūṭa māṭṭārkaḷ.'' (Attavaṇaiyil avarkaḷ kāriyam muṭivu peṟṟuviṭum)
